sentences.sentence: I didn’t stop until I got to the phone booth next to one of the biggest cafés on the Paseo.
sentences.translation: 我在步行街旁边一家大咖啡馆的电话厅前停了下来。

sentences.sentence: Located on the prestigious el Paseo DE la Castellana, Hesperia Madrid is centered in Madrid's acclaimed shopping district.
sentences.translation: 位于著名的埃尔·卡斯蒂利亚大道，马德里的中心是马德里的著名购物区。
